comment:
Dr. Zong is an amazing teacher that has inspired me in the few months I had her as a professor. 
For EDUC2110, you'll most likely be doing your field observations at an assigned school, so most of your grades will be from that as well as just weekly grades. 
Overall, Dr Zong is someone you'd want as a professor. Trust.

She is very nice. You read a few chapters online with a few assignments through that and then later in the semester you observe a public school class for 15 hours total with a few assignments based on that. Highly recommend her, she is kind and accessible if you needed to reach out to her and gives very kind feedback on assignments.
Absolutely amazing and is the best teacher imaginable. She cares about her students and makes sure everyone succeeds. She is very understanding and as long as you show up the class is easy.

Take her! So understanding, patient, and kind. Her due dates are flexible and she will make class online a few days towards the middle/end of the semester. Very easy to work with and the assignments are VERY reasonable. NO tests or quizzes. 1 group project.
Only downside is, it can be difficult to get a response from her via email.
rating_tags: Participation matters--Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback

comment: Professor Zong was one of the sweetest professors I have had. Super easy class, as long as you're on top of your assignments it's one of the less stressful classes you'll have.

Dr. Zong is one of the sweetest and most caring professors I have ever had. She is very professional, which can come off strict, but she is super understanding and easy to talk to. She has interesting lessons and assignments I really enjoyed! She also encourages groups, so I made lots of friends in her class. She is amazing!
very simple class, understanding prof, attendance not really mandatory, but she says it is. very simple assignments, gives A for completion.
rating_tags: Group projects--Clear grading criteria--Accessible outside class

comment: very simple and easy class, she is very patient and understanding group projects, but very simple and easy.
rating_tags: Group projects--Clear grading criteria--Accessible outside class

comment: Dr. Zong is very helpful.  She gives quick feedback.  I would take any of her courses again!
Professor Zong is a genuine teacher. She wholeheartedly cares about the success of her students and wants you to be the best teacher you can be.

The sweetest lady I've ever met!! She is so so nice and cares so much about her students! She believes in everyone and loves what she does. She accommodates everyone schedule and is so caring and checks up on everyone!! Best professor at Kennesaw

Dr. Zong gave a very reasonable amount of work for a summer course. The course was posted from the beginning (though one assignment was later changed) which let us work ahead. The readings and writing assignments were pretty typical for courses in this program. Grades, feedback, & email replies were prompt. A great choice for a summer class!

She is a very easy professor and really seems to authentically care about all of her students. She is is open to feedback and very obviously just wants this class to be the best it can for students across the board.

She is one of the best professors I have had at Kennesaw. She cares so much about her students, and she always extends deadlines to make sure that everyone turns assignments in on time. She always answered emails within the hour, and made sure to give thorough feedback on assignments. She grades so easily, and the class is impossible to fail.

Dr. Zong is one of the most caring, compassionate professors I've ever had. Her first words to us were: "I want this class to be useful to you." She stuck by that goal throughout the entire semester, and she was so understanding of how busy we all were. I would not hesitate to take another class with Dr. Zong. She's amazing.

She extends deadlines so you have so much time to complete assignments and manage other classes. She is so caring and really wants her students to succeed. If you do the work, you'll get an A. This class just took effort, no tests, just field experience.
Really cares about her students. When not in class she emails you to make sure you are okay. Do your work and you will get an A.

This will be the easiest A as long as you do the work, which there isn't much of. The lectures can be kind of confusing and boring, but all of the work you will turn in is online with clear instructions. Dr. Zong really does care about her students and what she teaches. Would take again!
rating_tags: ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS--GROUP PROJECTS--Would take again

comment: She is nice, but she doesn't really know what she is doing.. Her class is easy and we always got out early!
easy easy easy easy!!! lectures are boring but she grades easy!!!!
